message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1700000. Can you meet me at this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $1900000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1750000. Can you consider this price?
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $1850000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'd be willing to pay $1750000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $1800000.
I'm getting close to a deal, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $1700000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll sell it to you for $1775000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $1725000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
